o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: Check window business rule not a source of a pivot business rule (MDDE)
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: DijkC1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Comment: A window business rule cannot be used as a source for a pivot business rule.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that window business rules cannot be used as a source for a pivot business rule.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects have implemented window business rule where they are not allowed:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True
' Retrieve the source objects from the mapping. Dim colSourceObjects : Set colSourceObjects = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_SourceObjects")
' If the mapping has no source objects, stop here. If colSourceObjects.Count = 0 Then Exit Function End If
Dim objSourceObject For Each objSourceObject In colSourceObjects Dim joinedObject : Set joinedObject = GetRealObject(objSourceObject.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_JoinedObject")) If Not joinedObject Is Nothing Then If joinedObject.HasStereotype("mdde_WindowBusinessRule") Then %Check% = False WriteError joinedObject.DisplayName & " is a window business rule and cannot be used as source in a mapping on a pivot business rules." End if End If Next
End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
